name: Armageddon Racing - Car Racing Destruction
description:
ARMAGEDDON RACING is an action packed CAR GAME with STUNNING VISUALS , CARS, GUNS and EXPLOSIVE FUN.

   - ESCAPE THE FIRE WALL
 The planet is on the brink of destruction a huge wall of fire is destroying everything in its path

  - SPEED
 Use your high powered car to keep ahead of the wall of death

  - SMASH 
Score points by smashing other cars out of the way

  - ONE TOUCH CONTROLS
 No complex or unintuitive joysticks . Use the accelerator to steer and one button to brake

.  - INCREASING DIFFICULTY
As the firewall speeds up so must you!
